Group< NAtom > Class Template Reference
Chemical Structure

Detailed Description

template<int NAtom>
class McMd::Group< NAtom >

A group of covalently interacting atoms.

A group of atoms that interact via a permanent (covalent) NAtom Atom potential. Specializations of Group with NAtom=2, 3, and 4 are used to represent groups that interact via covalent bond, angle and dihedral interaction potentials, respectively. The Bond, Angle, and Dihedral typedefs are aliases for these template specializations.

A Group<NAtom> contains an array of pointers to Atoms in the group, and an integer type Id for the group. Parameters of the corresponding Natom body potential are different for groups with different type Ids.

bool isActive ( ) const [inline]

Is this group active?

Atoms and the groups containing them can be de-activated and re-activated by some Monte Carlo moves, such as configuration bias moves that remove and regrow parts of a molecule.
